dict.acceptation: 甚至；更加； 即使；恰巧在…时候；
公平的；平坦的； 偶数的；平均的；

sent.orig: Long car journeys are even less pleasant, for it is quite impossible even to read.
sent.trans: 乘汽车作长途旅行则更加不舒服，因为连看书都几乎不可能。

sent.orig: Even the thread of light which her pure love had brought her, even that was snapped.
sent.trans: 她的前途依然是一片浓密的黑暗，那一线被纯洁的爱情所带来的光明也给人家摧残了。

sent.orig: He won't tell me about it even though (even if) he knows the news.
sent.trans: 即使他知道这个动静，他也不会告诉我。

sent.orig: Even mountains wear down, even the nuclei of atoms decay.
sent.trans: 听其自然的话，就连高山也会慢慢消逝，甚至原子核也会衰竭。

sent.orig: Break-even sales have increased to 88,000 (that's bad) , even though total production costs have fallen.
sent.trans: 盈亏平衡销量增加到了88，000（这可不妙），即便总生产成本下降了。
